title: Ultimate Roast Beef Blues Sandwich
directions: Open the rolls and spread each side with 1 to 2 tablespoons of mayonnaise. Place 4 basil leaves on four of the rolls. Layer the same four rolls with the roast beef, 1 to 2 tablespoons of blue cheese, and a sprinkling of walnuts. Top each with the remaining half rolls.
ingredients: 4  whole wheat sub rolls, lightly toasted
1 pound thinly sliced cooked deli roast beef
